block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; dining alcove, windowed kitchen, 2 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $1,245, 62% tax-deductible; listed at $665,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; dining alcove, windowed kitchen, 2 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $1,245, 62% tax-deductible; listed at $665,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 1,650-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, 10-ft. ceilings, marble baths, crown moldings, parquet floors; common charge $960; taxes $5,000; listed at $1.35 million, 5 weeks on market (Broker: A. J. Clarke)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, decorative fireplace, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,821, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $1.25 million (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy; Halstead Property Co.)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 630-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen and bath, high ceilings, balcony; common charge $482, includes electricity; taxes $1,068; listed at $325,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Gala-West)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated kitchen, pool and health club in building; common charge $773; taxes $3,180; listed at $599,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

1,600-sq.-ft. circa-1900 carriage-house loft; recreation room, 1 bath, 4-car garage in need of renovation, 100-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,800; listed at $325,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, sunken living room, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $547, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $64,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Sandra Silverman Real Estate)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old semiattached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, full basement, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,000; listed at $339,000, 9 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/DiMasi)

2-family, 80-year-old detached stucco-sided house; 4 bedrooms in primary unit; 3 bedrooms in other; dining room, 1 bath in each; 1-car garage, 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,090; listed at $375,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Homes 'R' Beautiful)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; dining room, windowed kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, common garden; maintenance $500, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $375,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

2-family, 40-year-old semiattached brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths in upper floor unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath in other; dining room, eat-in kitchen in each; 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $384,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 65-year-old attached house; dining room, h/w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 18-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $2,100; listed at $315,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 890-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; h/w floors, Manhattan skyline view, parking space; maintenance $553, 45% tax-deductible; listed at $67,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Giordano; Gateway Arms)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 78-year-old colonial; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, 1-car attached garage; 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,420; listed at $385,000; 14 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 13-year-old town house; powder room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, tennis, pool, storage room, skylight, 0.12-acre lot; taxes $10,300; listed at $469,000; 27 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Rand; Houlihan/Lawrence)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 70-year-old ranch; cathedral ceiling, stone fireplace, exposed beams, skylights, barn, eat-in kitchen, lake views and access; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $4,218; listed at $245,000; 6 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 31-year-old split-level; entry hall, dining area, fireplace, playroom, eat-in kitchen, storage room, cul-de-sac, 1-car garage; 0.38-acre lot; taxes $7,449; listed at $379,000; 15 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Wolff)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 26-year-old contemporary; dining room, den, 2-car attached garage, fireplace, pool, 0.8-acre lot; taxes $13,900; listed at $695,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman-Jane Hayes)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 24-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, basement, 2-car attached garage, pool, 0.83-acre lot; taxes $9,800; listed at $349,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Manzoni)
4-bedroom, 3-bath, 46-year-old colonial; dining room, 1-car attached garage, 70-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $6,900; listed at $339,900, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,826-sq.-ft. town-house condo in a 28-year-old building; center hall, dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, family room, rear deck, fireplace, c/a, 2-car garage; common charge $250; taxes $6,365; listed at $579,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 28-year-old colonial; renovated kitchen, family room, French doors, wrap-around deck, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.33-acre lot; taxes $5,664; listed at $522,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Norwalk; K. McCormick)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 14-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen with skylights, family room, home office, terrace, fireplace, c/a, 2-car garage, 1.1-acre lot; taxes $12,129; listed at $1.65 million, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; Coldwell Banker/Riverside)
3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, dining room, full basement, c/a, 2-car garage, 67-by-161-ft. lot; taxes $4,933; listed at $249,900, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)
5-bedroom, 3-bath newly constructed colonial; fireplace, den, 2-zone heat, c/a, 3-car garage, 7-acre lot; taxes to be assessed; listed at $479,900, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 14-year-old colonial; 3-car garage, c/a, in-ground pool, gym, 3 fireplaces, central vacuum, 2-acre lot; taxes $9,960; listed at $1.59 million, 7 months on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Marron & Gildea)
